mapper.select: select count(1) from t_pt_customer_keyword where fMark = 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_pt_customer_keyword(fUuid, fTitle, fCurrentPosition, fPrice, fCapturePositionQueryTime ) SELECT fUuid, fTitle, fCurrentPosition, IF(fPositionFirstPageFee > '', fPositionFirstPageFee, 0.00), fCapturePositionQueryTime FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fCustomerUuid = #{cusId} AND fType = #{type} AND fStatus = 1

insert into t_pt_customer_keyword(fUuid, fOperaStatus ) SELECT fUuid, IF(fCurrentPosition = 0 and fOptimizedCount = 0 and fInvalidDays >= 4 and fLastOptimizeDateTime > current_date(), 0, 1) FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fCustomerUuid = #{cusId} AND fType = #{type} AND fStatus = 1
insert into t_pt_customer_keyword(fUuid, fKeyword, fUrl, fTitle ) SELECT CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID, KEYWORD, URL, TITLE FROM cms_keyword WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 4
mapper.update: update t_pt_customer_keyword set fMark = #{mark} where fMark = #{targetMark} limit #{rows}
UPDATE t_customer_keyword ck, t_pt_customer_keyword tqck SET ck.fKeyword = tqck.fKeyword, ck.fUrl = tqck.fUrl, ck.fTitle = tqck.fTitle, ck.fStatus = 1 WHERE ck.fUuid = tqck.fUuid and tqck.fMark = 2
